job_details.experience_required: Minimum 10 years of post-undergraduate Java development experience

jd: From: vikas sharma, Sita Consulting Services vikas@scstech.us Reply to: vikas@scstech.us The State of Michigan is looking for a System Analyst 6 for a hybrid role based in Lansing, MI. Here’s a summary of the position: This role emphasizes both technical writing and Java development skills, ensuring technical documentation aligns with business needs while contributing to code analysis and system design.If you're interested, ensure to submit your application before the deadline and indicate willingness for an in-person interview. Job Details:Position Title: System Analyst 6 (Modernization Systems Analyst)Submission Deadline: 10/30 at 10 AM ESTInterview Type: In-person interview REQUIRED (Indicate Y/N on the coversheet)Duration: 1 year, with possible extensionLocation: Lansing, MI (Hybrid – 2 days onsite per week: Tuesday and Wednesday)Local Candidates Only: Must reside within 60 miles of Lansing, MIPosition Summary:The Systems Analyst will work with the ORS Development and Operations Teams to:Analyze current system architectureResearch emerging technologiesPrepare specifications, configure software, and evaluate and test program codeLead and manage system and software architecture design and quality assurance plansDesign, prototype, and implement solutions to achieve client business resultsDocument and develop long-term technology strategyThe role supports key applications such as ORS Clarety, Employer Self Service (ESS), miAccount, and Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM.Required Skills:Senior Java developer skill set, with the ability to read/write codeMinimum 10 years of post-undergraduate Java development experienceMinimum 6 years of experience as a System Analyst/Technical Writer on large-scale systems (retirement systems preferred)Proficiency in writing technical specifications and familiarity with SwaggerStrong knowledge of Java, J2EE, WebSphere, ASP.Net, .Net 6.0, Angular, React, etc.Experience with design patterns, Java MVC frameworks (Struts MVC), Hibernate, and web servicesProficiency with Microsoft SQL Server, SQL, and stored proceduresExperience with Corticon Rules Engine, WebSphere Liberty, Git, Content Management systems like Filenet, and microservices/cloud-based deploymentsProficiency with security frameworks, JWT, OAuth, Spring Boot, and batch frameworksFamiliarity with Azure DevOps, Jenkins, Maven, OpenShift, Docker, and KubernetesExperience with Visio and process modeling software such as Rational Rose, UML diagrams, etc.Knowledge of web services, process automation, and cloud technologiesExcellent communication skillsNice-to-Have:Familiarity with documentation standardsPrevious experience with the State of MichiganAgile experience
